messages.content: I'm writing to you about the important choice we face in the General Election in just a few short weeks time.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg helped deliver a strong, stable Government that has rescued the British economy.
Helped to deliver tax cuts for over 200,000 people in Sheffield.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote for a Tory candidate who won't win, or we can back Nick Clegg to make sure that Ed Miliband’s Labour candidate doesn't sneak in through the back door.

issues.economy: Nick Clegg helped deliver a strong, stable Government that has rescued the British economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: This time, I'm voting for Nick Clegg and I want you to as well.

endorsements.endorsement: I've been a lifelong Conservative and I was the Conservative candidate here in Sheffield Hallam in 2001.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg has been incredibly brave. In 2010 he put the country before narrow party interests and helped deliver a strong, stable Government that has rescued the British economy and helped to deliver tax cuts for over 200,000 people in Sheffield.

images.caption: John Harthman, Former Conservative candidate for Sheffield Hallam

leaflet.additionalNotes: John Harthman, a lifelong Conservative and previous Conservative candidate, is endorsing Nick Clegg and encouraging others to vote for him.
